thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 47 of 3654
thread.title: Ezra

author: Ezra
title: Ezra
text:
Wanting to become a better bible scholar, I ordered a bunch of books right after christmas. We were getting really bad snowstorms through Idaho, so I didn't think they would get here until after new years. I was wrong. They got here before new year's. Plus they gave me free shipping and no sales tax. After I got all my books, they then had a coupon for $15 off my next order.
So the downside is that most of their books are used. You can get new or like new on some titles. And you never know. Some books I have from them are barely used. At $3.79-3.95 a book, you can't compete with that.
